summary: The Rockmores set out on a family road trip with an uninvited Kel stashed in the trunk. While camping out in the woods, Kenan has a scary encounter with a mysterious, shadowy figure...
cast: Kenan Thompson|Kel Mitchell|Ken Foree|Teal Marchande|Vanessa Baden|Milton Berle|Time Winters|Bonnie Hellman|Tom Knickerbocker|Michael Berryman|Jonathan T. Floyd|Joel McCrary|Terry Ray|Sonje Fortag|Sonya Leslie|Martin Clark|David C. Fisher|Doreen Weese|Michael Egan
keywords: series finale|african american family|african american|thunderstorm|eyes watching from behind a painting
title: Kenan y Kel: La leyenda del caballero sin cabeza.
